channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- Control for BeagleBone
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- Control for BeagleBone

item.title: CVE-2018-25048|2024-08-05T12:26:39.648Z -- codesys -- control%20for%20beaglebone
item.description: The CODESYS runtime system in multiple versions allows an remote low privileged attacker to use a path traversal vulnerability to access and modify all system files as well as DoS the device.
